feed.title: GitHub PowerShell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of PowerShell in GitHub

entry.title: aaronparker/apptracker
entry.summary:
Uses Evergreen to query for application version updates and store the result in JSON

App Tracker

An application version tracker that uses Evergreen to query for application version updates and store the result in JSON format.

A workflow is run every 8-hours to retrieve available updates and commit changes to this repository.
